game.name: Cozy Farm Manager
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Cozy farming meets management sim - Hire and develop a team of farmhands, fulfill major contracts, combat pests with chemicals or biodiversity, and manage a limited water supply. Grow your farm’s reputation through thoughtful planning, sustainable choices, and smart business decisions!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cozy farming meets management sim - Hire and develop a team of farmhands, fulfill major contracts, combat pests with chemicals or biodiversity, and manage a limited water supply. Grow your farm’s reputation through thoughtful planning, sustainable choices, and smart business decisions!
